name: Clone Racer
description:
Change lanes with a tap to pass slower cars, get out of the way of speeding ambulances, and avoid road hazards. Easy to learn, hard to master… especially when you’re dealing with six roads on one screen.

With a radical ‘80s soundtrack and retro 8-bit graphics, you’ll be racing in style. How far can you make it?

• 5 modes: Normal, Hard, Nightmare, Insanity, and Impossible
• Choose your boosts: Revive, Shield, Star, Warning
• Beat your friends to the top of the leaderboard!
• Earn achievements as you conquer the road
